Description.Name: ComStar News Bureau
Description.Details:
Following up on their gains in the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreCapellanMarch],Capellan March]], the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreLiaoCCAF],CCAF]] forces (joined by the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreCCAFDeathCommandos],Death Commandos]]) conquered [[DM.SystemDefs[starsystemdef_SteinsFolly],Stein's Folly]].  Once again, the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreDavionAFFS],AFFS]] appear to have been caught flat footed.



It seems the [[DM.Factions[faction_Davion],Federated Suns]] can't catch a break, the [[DM.Factions[faction_Kurita],Draconis Combine]] launched a massive assault on [[DM.SystemDefs[starsystemdef_Galtor],Galtor III]] last month, with a combined effort by several [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreKuritaDCMS],DCMS]] units.  From all reports, it sounds like the local AFFS troops are outmatched and outnumbered.



An unusual report has come in about a radical [[DM.MechDefs[mechdef_charger_CGR-1A1],Charger]] variant which was developed by a master technician in the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreMercHRB],Hat-in-the-Ring]] mercenary unit.  The so-called '[[DM.MechDefs[mechdef_charger_CGR-SB],Challenger]]' reduces the engine to upgrade the weapon payload to be a serious threat.



The Combine has unveiled a new Tokugawa variant, the [[DM.VehicleDefs[vehicledef_TOKUGAWA_TKG-151].Description,TKG-151]], which is armed with dual [[DM.WeaponDefs[Weapon_Autocannon_AC2_0-STOCK],Autocannon 2s]] for ranged sniping.

Description.Name: ComStar News Bureau
Description.Details:
The mercenary unit known as {COMPANY.CompanyName} has been very active over the past several months in this region shooting up the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreMRB],MRB]] rankings.



If you find yourself in need of a reputable band of guns for hire, trust ComStar's Mercenary Review Board to provide you with an unbiased rating and discreet management of your contracts.





This has been the CNB July broadcast.
